function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differences in enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases due to inconsistent measures","Mitigation":"Standardize enforcement measures and communication of pandemic urgency","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, data analysis for enforcement monitoring","People":"General population, visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Health authorities, urban green space managers"},{"Description":"Inconsistent communication and response to pandemic urgency","Impact":"Risk of a less coordinated social response and increased contagion","Mitigation":"Consistent and clear communication of pandemic urgency, coordination of social response","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, social media coordination platforms","People":"General population, urban green space visitors","Owner":"Health authorities, government communication agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in designing mobility protocols for urban green spaces","Impact":"Potential for uncontrolled visitor mobility and increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Design and implement clear, effective mobility protocols, enforce restrictions","Technologies":"Geolocation monitoring, data analysis for visitor tracking","People":"Managers of urban green spaces, visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Urban green space management, local authorities"}]}
